message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study utilizes data from the World Development Indicators and the Doing Business database to investigate the relationship between economic growth and business environment.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Doing Business"], "topic": ["Competitiveness", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We employed the Socio-economic Panel dataset and a national survey conducted among Turkish migrants in Germany to investigate the factors that influence employment outcomes of immigrants.", "dataset": ["Socio-economic Panel dataset", "national survey"], "topic": ["Migration"]}, {"sentence": "Using the Social Accounting Matrix dataset, we analyzed the impact of agricultural policies on household income and food security in Uganda.", "dataset": ["Social Accounting Matrix dataset"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the implications of removing energy subsidies using household survey data from Indonesia and Peru.", "dataset": ["household survey data from Indonesia", "household survey data from Peru"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "To estimate the effects of natural disasters on poverty levels, we merged disaster damage data from EM-DAT with household surveys from Bangladesh and Haiti.", "dataset": ["EM-DAT", "household surveys from Bangladesh", "household surveys from Haiti"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We utilized panel data from the World Bank Entreprise Surveys and the Global Financial Development Database to examine the relationship between access to finance and private sector growth in MENA countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank Entreprise Surveys", "Global Financial Development Database"], "topic": ["Financial Sector", "Regional Integration"]}, {"sentence": "This research used a combination of satellite imagery and ground truthing data from the Forest Landscape Integrity Index to assess deforestation rates across various regions in Brazil.", "dataset": ["satellite imagery", "Forest Landscape Integrity Index", "ground truthing data"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We used data from the Demographic Health Surveys and national health surveys to study the impact of healthcare reforms on maternal and child health outcomes across various African countries.", "dataset": ["Demographic Health Surveys", "national health surveys"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This study combined data from the World Input-Output Database and the Global Trade Analysis Project to assess the impacts of trade agreements on employment levels in Southeast Asian countries.", "dataset": ["World Input-Output Database", "Global Trade Analysis Project"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "Using the Humanitarian Data Exchange platform, we created a database of refugee populations in the MEA region and constructed a network model to analyze migration flow patterns.", "dataset": ["Humanitarian Data Exchange platform"], "topic": ["Migration"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This study utilizes data from the World Development Indicators and the Doing Business database to investigate the relationship between economic growth and business environment.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Doing Business"], "topic": ["Competitiveness", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We employed the Socio-economic Panel dataset and a national survey conducted among Turkish migrants in Germany to investigate the factors that influence employment outcomes of immigrants.", "dataset": ["Socio-economic Panel dataset", "national survey"],
